channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Assembleia da República
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Assembleia da República

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Porto Canal and Sol, 11–14 January 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 25.3–30.8%
  • Partido Socialista: 36.0–42.0%
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 5.1–8.2%
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 1.3–3.1%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 4.1–6.8%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 1.4–3.2%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 0.7–2.2%
  • Chega: 4.2–7.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by CESOP–UCP for Público and RTP, 11–14 January 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 26.1–30.0%
  • Partido Socialista: 36.9–41.1%
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 6.0–8.2%
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 1.5–2.7%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 5.0–7.1%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 1.5–2.7%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 4.1–6.1%
  • Chega: 6.9–9.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Observador and TVI, 29 December 2020–10 January 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 24.6–31.6%
  • Partido Socialista: 37.5–45.2%
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 5.4–9.4%
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 0.6–2.5%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 3.6–7.1%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 1.3–3.7%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 2.8–6.0%
  • Chega: 4.3–8.0%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Intercampus, 4–7 January 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 20.8–27.6%
  • Partido Socialista: 34.2–41.9%
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 7.1–11.7%
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 1.4–3.9%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 4.1–7.8%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 2.4–5.5%
  • LIVRE: 0.0–0.9%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 2.6–5.7%
  • Chega: 7.1–11.7%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Observador and TVI, 22 December 2020–3 January 2021 – Voting Intentions

  • Partido Socialista: 37.1–44.7%
  • Bloco de Esquerda: 5.5–9.6%
  • CDS–Partido Popular: 0.8–2.7%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária: 2.8–6.0%
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza: 1.0–3.1%
  • LIVRE: 0.0–0.9%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 1.8–4.5%
  • Chega: 6.5–10.9%
